==Description==
The Cleric is a class that heals and deals holy damage.

==Main Purpose==
The Cleric serves as a median between [Mage] and [Fighter] (statisticwise), as well as a class that does various types of healing, and some minor raw damage.

==Statistics==
The Cleric uses primarily Magic, secondarily Power, and has a Mana statistic to augment this.
